title: Air 11 inch mid 2012 Trackpad issue
message: Hello, i have an air 11 inch with slow responsive trackpad, changed it for a new one which actually works better, but it still feels not so accurate. How should i troubleshoot this? I saw some vids from Louis but most of the are dead trackpad, mine is working but not smooth. Could it be caused by other bad parts as well, like keyboard?

title: Air 11 inch mid 2012 Trackpad issue
message: Run EFI ASD and check for sensor errors. Also check if it only happens with AC connected, garbage Chinese chargers will freak out the trackpad.
